mapper.select: SELECT id, day_id, title, start_at, end_at, place_name, address, lat, lng, expected_cost, normalized_category, first_image, first_image2, is_Ended FROM plan_places WHERE day_id = #{dayId} ORDER BY start_at ASC

SELECT tplace.id, tplace.day_id, tplace.title, tplace.start_at, tplace.end_at, tplace.place_name, tplace.address, tplace.lat, tplace.lng, tplace.expected_cost, tplace.normalized_category, tplace.first_image, tplace.first_image2, tplace.is_Ended FROM plan_places tplace INNER JOIN plan_days td ON tplace.day_id = td.id WHERE td.plan_id = #{planId} ORDER BY td.day_index ASC, tplace.start_at ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan_places (day_id, title, start_at, end_at, place_name, address, lat, lng, expected_cost, normalized_category, first_image, first_image2, is_Ended) VALUES (#{dayId}, #{title}, #{startAt}, #{endAt}, #{placeName}, #{address}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{expectedCost}, #{normalizedCategory}, #{firstImage}, #{firstImage2}, #{isEnded})

INSERT INTO plan_places ( day_id, title, start_at, end_at, place_name, address, lat, lng, expected_cost, normalized_category, first_image, first_image2, is_Ended ) VALUES
( #{place.dayId}, #{place.title}, #{place.startAt}, #{place.endAt}, #{place.placeName}, #{place.address}, #{place.lat}, #{place.lng}, #{place.expectedCost}, #{place.normalizedCategory}, #{place.firstImage}, #{place.firstImage2}, #{place.isEnded} )
mapper.update: UPDATE plan_places SET day_id = #{dayId}, title = #{title}, start_at = #{startAt}, end_at = #{endAt}, place_name = #{placeName}, address = #{address}, lat = #{lat}, lng = #{lng}, expected_cost = #{expectedCost}, normalized_category = #{normalizedCategory}, is_ended = #{isEnded} WHERE id = #{id}
